channel.title: Digg Store - Digg
channel.description: Digg Store on Digg: the best articles, videos, tweets, and original content that the web is talking about right now

item.title: Save 40% Off This Portable Wand Designed To Keep Your Gadgets Sanitized
item.description: Keep your phone clean and germ-free wherever you go with the Portable Rechargeable UV-C Sterilizer Wand. This UV sanitizer light is certified with a 99.9% anti-germ rate and it's 40 percent off at just $59.99.

item.title: Save $50 Off This High-Powered Personal Massage Gun for All Your Aches and Pains
item.description: Suffering through muscle aches and pains after your home workouts? Get back up and at 'em with the Vortix Melo Massager. This handheld tool has six intensity levels to alleviate muscle soreness. It's 33 percent off now.

item.title: Write A Novel In Self-Isolation With The Help Of This $30 Training
item.description: When you're stuck in self-isolation, it's a perfect time to finally write that novel you've been thinking about. The Digital Creative Fiction Writing Certification Bundle will help you do it and it's just $29.99 now.

item.title: Access Content From Around The World With This Clever VPN
item.description: When you're in self-isolation, you're going to be watching a lot of TV. Using Surfshark to bypass geo-restrictions will give you access to content from around the world. A two-year subscription is 76 percent off.

item.title: Chill Out In Self-Isolation With These CBD Gummies On Sale For 25% Off
item.description: Looking to take the edge off in self-isolation? These CBD Gummies are infused with 99.99 percent hemp isolate powder that will ease pain, combat stress, and help you chill out. Get 500mg for 25 percent off at $29.99.

item.title: Get A Luxury Bamboo Sheet Set For Almost $200 Off
item.description: It's always good idea to change your sheets regularly. Need a backup set? These luxury rayon bamboo sheets will keep you cozy throughout the night. Plus, they're 72 percent off now.

item.title: This Bottle Cleans Itself, Eliminating 99.9% of Harmful Viruses And Bacteria
item.description: To stay on the safe side, you should be cleaning everything before you put your mouth on it. LIZ does it for you. This smart bottle cleans itself with UV sterilization, ensuring you're always safe before drinking.

item.title: Get This Self-Sanitizing Toilet Brush For 20% Off
item.description: Keeping the toilet clean is a part of life. But cleaning it with the same old dirty brush over and over is foolish. The LUMI Self-Sanitizing Toilet Brush & Base ensures you have a more hygienic method.

item.title: Brush Up On Your Golf Game At Home With These Six Systems

item.title: Kick Your Feet Up, And Enjoy The Comfort Of Guaranteed Zero-Slippage Premium Bamboo Yarn On Your Feet

item.title: Upgrade Your Kitchen Without the Cost! These Are The 25 Best Knives For Any Budget, On Sale Now
item.description: Score big savings on sweet knives.

item.description: Chances are, you've never met a multi-tool like Geekey. With a bike spoke wrench, multiple closed wrench and screwdriver fits, it'll help you do just about anything. It even works as a pipe! And it's 58 percent off at $22.99.

item.description: Save big on Microsoft products when you buy factory-recertified.

item.description: Want top-tier wireless headphones but don't want to pay top-tier prices? Get these refurbished Sony MDR-XB650BT Extra Bass Wireless Headphones now. They're 53 percent off at just $59.99.

item.description: We've rounded up some deals on massage therapy guns that are a fraction of the price of the top brands on the market.

item.description: Check out these great deals on refurbished Microsoft Surface books, Chromebooks, MacBooks, and Windows laptops.

item.description: These products can help you shave a few strokes off your game and they're all on sale.

item.description: Look fly in any season with the Stan Round Sunglasses! These stylish specs feature UV400 protection and are currently 33 percent off $24 at just $15.99.

item.title: If You Want to Learn to Code In 2020, Here Is Where You Need To Start
item.description: So you missed the boat on learning to code in college? That's fine because your education never really stops and if you're considering building a website or changing careers in 2020, you have plenty of time to learn to code.

item.description: Want to learn something new? Alison gives you access to more than 1,000 ad-free courses in technology, business, and more. Get lifetime access for 87 percent off $790 at just $99 today.

item.description: We've rounded up deals on everything from external drives and wireless adapters to gaming chairs and complete consoles so you can enjoy better gameplay wherever you go.

item.title: Upgrade Your Emergency Kit With A Flashlight, Headlamp, And Lantern For 66% Off
item.description: You never know when you might need a light! On the trail or in an emergency at night, light can be a lifeline. The ZeroDark 3-Piece Tactical Set has a flashlight, lantern, and headlamp and it's only $19.99.

item.title: Mitigate Your Investing Risks By Learning Quantitative Trading Strategies
item.description: Investing in the stock market is risky, but you can mitigate some of that risk by learning the algorithmic secrets of quantitative trading. The Quantitative Trading for Beginners Bundle is just $49 today.

item.title: These 260 Dollar Noise-Cancelling Headphones Are On Sale For Just 70 Bucks Today
item.description: The TREBLAB Z2 Wireless Noise-Cancelling Headphones deliver pumping bass, 35-hour battery life, and elite noise-cancellation. No wonder they're an Amazon's Choice Product. Save 73 percent off when you buy today.

item.title: Get Ahead of Valentine's Day With This Unbeatable Deal From Florists.com
item.description: Valentine's Day is nearly here and you can schedule a flower delivery for that special someone now through Florists.com. If you schedule today and use the code LOVE10, you'll get $40 of credit for just $10.

item.title: Launch A Lucrative IT Career After You Earn These Core CompTIA Certifications
item.description: CompTIA is the leading IT certification body in the country. If you want to work in IT, you have to get certified through CompTIA. This massive bundle will help you earn five core certifications and it's just $39.

item.title: Break Into a Six-Figure Cloud Career With This AWS Certification Bundle
item.description: Amazon Web Services (AWS) is the world's leading cloud provider by a wide margin. That's why certified cloud experts make the big bucks. You can become one with help from this bundle, now available for $59.

item.title: Score More Than $200 Off The World's Top-Grossing Language Learning Software
item.description: Babbel makes learning a new language easier than ever by cutting out the fluff to get to real, practical vocabulary. Get lifetime access to their full language library for 60% off today at just $159.

item.title: Recover From Workouts Like A Pro Athlete With 15% Off This Muscle Stimulator
item.description: After a tough workout, it's important to stimulate your muscles to aid recovery. The PowerDot 2.0 Smart Muscle Stimulator does just that with 12 customizable modes. Save 15 percent off when you get it for $296 today.

item.title: Get Massive Savings On These Discounted Chromebooks and Windows Laptops
item.description: In the market for a new laptop? Before you go off and spend a grand on something you're not sure you'll love, take a peek at some of these options on sale for an incredible discount today. There's something here for every budget and every type of user.

item.title: Looking For A Side Hustle? You Should Hone Your SEO & Content Marketing Sales
item.description: Every company has a need for digital marketers. As such, digital marketing makes a great side hustle. Learn SEO, content marketing, and more lucrative side hustle skills in this bundle, now just $29.

item.title: Learn How To Build 15 Different Projects With Python For Just $11
item.description: Python is one of the world's most popular and most important general-purpose programming languages. In the Python 3 Complete Bootcamp, you'll learn this language by building 15 real projects. Get it for $10.99.

item.title: Get Over 45 Hours Of Microsoft Excel Certification Training For Less Than $40
item.description: It's one thing to put Microsoft Excel on your resume, it's another entirely to actually know how to use it. The Professional Microsoft Excel Certification Training Bundle will help you become an Excel whiz for just $39.

item.title: Work Towards A Six-Figure Salary When You Become A Lean Six Sigma Expert
item.description: Lean Six Sigma is one of the world's leading project methodologies, and certified practitioners demand six-figure salaries. Get up to speed with this four-course bundle, now on sale for just $49.

item.title: Play Games And Protect Your Phone With This Ingenious 2-In-1 Case
item.description: Turn your phone into a gaming powerhouse with GAMECASE! This protective case charges your phone while giving you access to more than 400 awesome handheld games. Right now, it's just $29.99.

item.title: Real Estate Investment Is Smarter Than Ever With The Help Of This App
item.description: Real estate investment is a risky business. With Mashvisor, however, it's a bit less risky. This analytics platform helps you identify property potential based on data. Right now, a lifetime subscription is just $39.

item.title: These Roses Look Beautiful And Last Longer — And They're 25% Off
item.description: Want to show someone you care? These boxed roses are carefully preserved to last longer and stay fresher than regular florist roses. Normally $299, they're on sale for just $224.25 today.

item.title: Chronicle Your Stories In 2020 With These Awesome Notebooks
item.description: These notebooks and journals can help you indulge your inner Hemingway — and they're all on sale now.

item.title: This Handy Daypack Is Perfect For Professional City Life
item.description: Life moves pretty fast in New York City. That's the inspiration behind the Venque Daypack. This backpack transitions from weekend to boardroom effortlessly and keeps everything organized. It's 15 percent off now.

item.title: Round Out Your Cutlery With This 7-Piece Knife Set, Now $70 Off
item.description: No kitchen is complete without great cutlery. This 7-piece knife block set from Schmidt Brothers includes all the high-carbon knives you need to perform any kitchen task. Right now, they're 30 percent off at $181.99.

item.title: Save 35% Off This High Style Minimalist Watch
item.description: Complete any look with the AQUA Men's Watch! This sleek, minimalist Swiss movement watch will complete any look, from casual Friday to a closing meeting. Save 35 percent off $195 when you get it for $126.75 today.

item.title: Learn Data Analytics with Excel, Python, Tableau, And More In This Training Bundle
item.description: Data rules everything in the business world and, if you want to get ahead, you have to know how to manage and analyze data. This bundle dives into multiple data analytics tools and programs, and it's just $49 now.

item.title: These $30 Headphones Put On A Light Show To Your Music
item.description: Love your music? Love light shows? Then you'll love Spark Headphones. These fun headphones put on a light show to the rhythm of your favorite music, and they're 69 percent off $99 at just $29.99 today.
